description: literally has saved me so many times. can stack manual save points on top of daily snapshots and it'll keep the history of both which came in handy. lets me create a snapshot of a fresh install, one with my most needed apps loaded, then i let it auto-run each day. perfect for my needs. like the option to specify if it saves /home and/or /root as well.
crash so many time and cause system failure as storage stress is too slow process and too massive
summary: need to be more windows like

description: A very useful application, works perfectly!
This software works if you know what you are doing. It is not a disk imager as such and is more powerfull than disc imaging. I restored an encrypted Kubuntu from one PC to another, worked great!
This app helps a lot because I often trying lots of Desktop Environtments. When the new installed DE is not to my liking , just restore from the backup to uninstall all of the packages!
summary: Best Backup software after messing up with Desktop Environments

description: As of recent Timeshift is useless, It was a great utility until glib2 was upgraded, Backing up using GUI or Command-line causes the system to crash to a never ending loop into the console.
I like the idea of having incremental backups and restore points, but I get constant (several times a week) alerts of seg faults with this app. Seems to work well other than that.
This is Amazing app to keep a backup of your linux!!

Thanks to the timeshift team, it saved me today. But I have some issue like some of my data is not restored perfectly, like after restoring my backup brave browser seemed to be crashed and not launching even the logo was not showing. But most importantly all of my important data is secure and I got is back.

I have used timeshift since nearly the first release back in 2017 and it has saved me from disaster several times.

It is truly a program written with the spirit of UNIX in mind. It does one thing and it does it well. It lets you restore your operating system files and configuration to a previous state in a simple and reliable way. Set it up and forget it until the day you need it. You will be glad you did!

I use timeshift the same way on all my computers which run Linux. I set it up to write the snapshots to a fast micro-SD card or a fast but tiny USB3 flash drive. As the amount of data to be backed up is not huge, even just 32GB is enough at a pinch. 

Using a separate device to store the snapshots means I can even survive a failure on the operating system disk, as timeshift can restore the most recent snapshot and even re-install the bootloader to a new disk.

As explained on the github project page, timeshift is for backing up and restoring your system files, not user files, so you should make other arrangements for them.

Top tip - always set up some "on boot" snapshots. If you install some updates and they mess up your system, you can always restore from the previous "on boot" backup to be up and running again in minutes. 

My sincere thanks to the author for a great program.
summary: Essential tool for both old hands and greenhorns!

description: Thenks to the timeshift team!
You have to use this right. Don't treat it as a backup of your entire computer, but use it to revert updates that break things. System backup only. If you do that, it works like a charm.

I have been using Timeshift for a very long time, and it is a very good backup tool! It is not good for your files, but it saves you when you accidently destroy your system, or, you can even backup an entire system with timeshift!

I highly recommend it!
love this app, so useful and just maintains itself if you set it up to do so. one of the first apps i get after every fresh install
the best app for backup
This app is a must-have, today i downloaded an update and this had a bug which messed up some stuff, i just restored my PC with Timeshift and everything is perfectly fine now!
very good for backup

This is not a system backup image creator in fact whatever it says it does it doesn't work. I created a restore state and after it finished it made no changes to my system. But the file it created at first was massive... I just wanted to keep my system clean :(
Timeshif is easy yet powerfull software to backup your files.
Timeshift hat mich das ein oder andere mal vor einer schlaflosen Nacht bewart
Super Tool! Hat mir schon mehrmals mein System gerettet.
Für Linux so ein system perfekt.

Das ist das einfachste Backup Programm, dass ich kenne. Es ist Ideal für Anfänger in sachen BackUp. Man wird durch die Menüs geführt und kann nichts falsch machen. Weiterhin läuft es äußerst stabil, keine Abstürze bei mir ( xubuntu+ubuntu Studio ).

Morgen ist die Frist für meine Abschlussarbeit. Vor einer halben Stunde war dann mein System weg, mit Zotero-Datenbank und allem drum und dran, auch der Arbeit eines halben Tages. Ich hatte versehentlich beim Prokrastinieren wichtige Pakete gelöscht. Das war nicht so gut. Timeshift hat sich vom Recovery-Modus aus starten lassen. Mein System ist wieder da. Ich könnte heulen. Deswegen ist auch dieser Text so prosaisch lang. Vielen Dank an die Entwickler*innen!
summary: die dünne Linie zwischen meinem Chaos und mir

description: Läuft leider nicht unter Ubuntu 22.04!
summary: Klasse Programm, war immer zufrieden, hat mir oft geholfen!

description: Es war Zeit, dass dieses Tool kam. Sollte Standard bei jeder Installation sein, falls nichts ähnliches vorhanden,
Läuft bei mir unter Kubuntu 22.04.LTS problemlos und stabil. Sollte vorinstalliert sein
It is very easy to use. Nice and clean interface

Lo utilizé cuando luego de una instalación de Linux Mint 
éste aterrizó y ya no quizo arrancar con nada.
Inicié con el pendrive Live. Busque Timeshift y en minutos
restauró una copia que había hecho de curioso al principio.
Pour l'instant Rien!!Bonne journée!!
Работает четко в автоматическом режиме, место много не занимает.
rsync真的是神命令，直达低层文件系统，既能恢复windows也能恢复linux，比Macos的时间机器还棒，不像timemachine还原了还要改配置，轻便纯粹，真.一键还原
summary: 太棒了，比Macos的时间机器还棒，轻便纯粹，真一键还原
